text: @realDonaldTrump When are you resigning? BTW, the greatest economy in the history of the country that you alone built? It was a house of cards for everyone but the 1%. But then you could care less about anyone else. Record 20.5 million American jobs lost in April. https://t.co/qmRbI4nZvW
